attributes.action: CHANGE IN IMMIGRATION LAW TO STOP FRAUD MARRIAGES  ONLY TO GAIN ENTRY IN UK.
attributes.additional_details: CHANGE IN IMMIGRATION LAW TO STOP FRAUD MARRIAGES  ONLY TO GAIN ENTRY IN UK AND THEN FALSELY CLAIMING DOMESTIC VIOLENCE ROUTE TO GET INDEFINITE TO REMAIN
attributes.background: CHANGE IN IMMIGRATION LAW TO STOP FRAUD MARRIAGES  ONLY TO GAIN ENTRY IN UK AND THEN FALSELY CLAIMING DOMESTIC VIOLENCE ROUTE TO GET INDEFINITE TO REMAIN

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what changes you would like to be made to immigration law.
